title: The Cat in the Christmas Tree: A Magical Tail
description: From Bestselling Author Peter Scottsdale Comes His First Children's Chapter Book For Ages 8 and UpIt’s Christmas Eve and Nathan’s cat is wrecking the holidays by destroying the Christmas tree. Fed up with Shadow’s antics, Dad wants the kitty out of the house – for good! So Nathan pleads for help in hope the magic of the holidays will allow him to keep his cat. In this enchanting tale (or should it be “tail?”), does Shadow change his misbehaving ways or will he ruin Christmas? Find out!
author: Peter Scottsdale
